search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Lawmatics (lawmatics.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Lawmatics is available at: [https://www.lawmatics.com/pricing](https://www.lawmatics.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Your practice, your pricing
---------------------------

Let's find your perfect fit.

*   Essential
    ---------
    
    For firms striving to boost client capacity while operating at peak efficiency.
    
    [Get pricing](https://www.lawmatics.com/demo-essential/)
    
    ### What's included:
    
    *   Client intake
        
    *   Lead management
        
    *   Calendaring
        
    *   Custom forms
        
    *   Task management
        
    *   2,500 contacts\*
        
    *   50 e-signatures
        
    *   250 text messages\*
        
    
*   Most popular
    
    Premium
    -------
    
    For firms targeting rapid growth, record high profitability, and market leadership.
    
    [Get pricing](https://www.lawmatics.com/demo-premium/)
    
    ### What's included:
    
    *   Every feature in Essential
        
    *   Unlimited automations
        
    *   Email marketing campaigns
        
    *   Advanced conflict checking
        
    *   ROI tracking & analysis
        
    *   Custom dashboards
        
    *   Event management
        
    *   10,000 contacts\*
        
    *   Unlimited e-signatures
        
    *   750 text messages\*
        
    
*   Enterprise
    ----------
    
    Talk to us for a comprehensive solution that meets all your large-scale cross‑functional needs.
    
    [Get pricing](https://www.lawmatics.com/demo-enterprise/)
    
    ### What's included:
    
    *   Custom pricing
        
    *   Full access to all features
        
    *   Dedicated account manager
        
    
    Time & Billing
    
    Time tracking, data insights, client management, payment processing, and invoicing — applicable to any plan.
    
    [Contact sales](https://www.lawmatics.com/demo)
    

\*Additional contacts and texts sold separately.

Lawmatics integrates with the apps you use every day  

-------------------------------------------------------

![Image 1: David Lehr](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

“

### “

### The one thing you can't buy as a lawyer is more time. Lawmatics gets you more time. It breaks that rule.”

David Lehr  
  
Managing Attorney, Strongest Defense

We've got your back.
--------------------

### Personalized onboarding

Our award-winning Customer Success Team will work directly with your team to develop a tailored plan suited to your firm’s business goals.

### Phone & email support

Whatever your firm may need, ouraward-winning Support Team is here to help so you can focus on what you do best: practicing law.

### Training documentation

Whether you have a question or just want to dive headfirst into Lawmatics features, our extensive Resource Center has the articles and tutorials you need.

![Image 2: Conti Moore Smith](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

“

### “

### Lawmatics pays for itself. Now my staff can focus on profit-generating tasks rather than manual processes related to client follow up.“  

Conti Moore Smith  
  
Managing Partner, Conti Moore Law Divorce Lawyers, PLLC

Compare plans side by side
--------------------------

##### User minimum

Grant your staff access to Lawmatics with dedicated user seats for strong collaboration.

##### User roles

Customize user access for security and efficient collaboration within Lawmatics.

##### Automations

Plan, measure, and manage all of your marketing campaigns.

##### Custom forms

Collect the intake information you need: notes, details, signatures, appointments, and whatever else you can imagine

##### Appointment booking

Let your clients pick and schedule an available time slot with you or any of your associates

##### E-signatures

Complete contracts, approvals, and other agreements in minutes.

##### Document automation

Build custom and advanced documents like fee agreements with reusable and personalizable features.

##### File requests

Use file requests to collect and receive files from anyone

##### Contacts

The sum of all contacts (Matters, Clients, etc.) available for the firm.

##### Client relationship  
management

Manage the relationship with all current and potential clients in one place. Take advantage of tasks, lists, and calendar to make keeping in touch a breeze.

##### Conflict checking

Search any term in all of your firm's matters, and approve, deny, or flag as a possible conflict manually or via automation.

##### Calendaring

Manage appointments and send automated reminders from within Lawmatics.

##### Round-robin scheduling

Distributed appointments evenly among team members.

##### Pipelines

Manage, prioritize, and nurture your prospective clients from initial inquiry to invoice.

##### Task management

Prioritize and organize your team's to-dos.

##### Two-way SMS / text messaging

Communicate more efficiently by sending and receiving text messages to and from your client's phone.

##### MMS

Receive photos and documents from clients via text

##### Event management

Manage registration for events of any size, from webinars to networking luncheons.

##### LMPay

Collect online payments from your clients directly from within Lawmatics.

##### Client portal

A simple, secure, and efficient way to communicate with your clients and keep them in the know on the status of their case.

##### HTML email builder

Build beautiful, responsive emails quickly and easily with our fully featured email builder.

##### LM\[AI\]

Generate fresh and professional email copy that resonates with prospective clients.

##### Email sends

Reach your prospects and clients effectively with a high allocation of email sends.

##### Audiences

Build audiences to better target your messaging.

##### Custom email domain

Have your automated emails come from your personal domain email address.

##### Analytics & dashboard

Measure, manage, and analyze marketing performance. Be more efficient and minimize wasted marketing dollars.

##### Custom reports

Slice and dice your data to get the answers to your most important business decisions.

##### Custom dashboards

Consolidate your critical intake, marketing, and financial metrics into an easy-to-use interface.

##### Source reporting

Collect data perinent to where your leads are coming from to better understand your marketing efficiency.

##### ROI tracking & analysis

Maximize marketing spending effectiveness and optimize return on investment (ROI) with key marketing data.

##### URL UTM tracking

Track the exact location your leads came into your funnel.

##### SAML SSO

Lawmatics offers enhanced security and seamless access with single sign-on authentication.

##### Comprehensive integrations

Seamlessly integrate with your preferred software tools for easy workflow optimization.

##### API access

Lawmatics' Open API will allow you to customize your app even further. Extensive documentation available.

##### Billing & invoicing

Send invoices and trust fund requests to collect payment from your matters.

##### Time & expense tracking

Record billable time and expenses to generate and send invoices.

##### Online payments

Use LMPay to allow clients to pay invoices online and on your custom forms.

\*Additional contacts and texts sold separately.

![Image 3: Matthew Sullivan](blob:http://localhost/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)

“

### “

### Lawmatics is a great platform for small and solo practices — and it's a great platform for very large, AM Law 100 firms.“  

Matthew Sullivan  
  
Executive Director of Finance and Operations, Sullivan Law & Associates

Law firms love Lawmatics
------------------------

Our customers give their clients the client-focused experience they deserve. Learn how they do it all with Lawmatics.

Ready to grow your law firm with Lawmatics?
-------------------------------------------

Schedule a demo of legal's #1 growth platform.

[Get a demo](https://www.lawmatics.com/demo/)

[![Image 4: Lawmatics Dashboard](blob:http://localhost/37070fe43939e5a69fcfc127a9675d8e)](https://www.lawmatics.com/demo-pricing/)

Not sure which plan is right for your firm?  

----------------------------------------------

Our experts can help.

[Get a demo](https://www.lawmatics.com/demo-pricing/)

Start streamlining your practice's intake and marketing today!

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing details are not publicly disclosed; users are directed to contact sales or schedule a demo for specific pricing information.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For firms striving to boost client capacity while operating at peak efficiency.
For firms targeting rapid growth, record high profitability, and market leadership.
Talk to us for a comprehensive solution that meets all your large-scale cross-functional needs.
